articles.title: Greetings to President of Cape Verde
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Cape Verde
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on July 1 sent a message of greeting to Jorge Carlos Fonseca, president of the Republic of Cape Verde, on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of its independence and the proclamation of the republic.
					 The message said that great achievements have been made in Cape Verde in its efforts for stability and economic development of the country for the past four decades since its independence.
					
					 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop in mutual interests, the message wished the president and people of Cape Verde greater success in their efforts for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Rwanda
articles.content:
Greeting to President of Rwanda
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Saturday sent a message of greeting to Paul Kagame, president of the Rwandan Republic, on the national holiday of the Rwandan people.
					 The message noted that Kim is pleased with the great achievements made by the government and people of Rwanda in their efforts for national reconciliation, unity and economic development. It expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Egyptian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Egyptian President
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of sympathy to Egyptian President Abdel Fattah alÔºçSisi in connection with the fact that shortly ago the prosecutor general of his country was killed by terrorists and armed terrorism in the Sinai area claimed casualties.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the president and, through him, to the bereaved families of the victims. It clarified the consistent stand of the DPRK government to oppose all forms of terrorism and any support to it and vehemently condemned recent terrorism in Egypt. 
					
					 It said that the DPRK would as always stand firm by the side of the president, the friendly government and people of Egypt in their struggle for opposing terrorism and defending the security and stability of the country and make positive efforts to steadily boost the traditional, friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 The message sincerely wished the president and the friendly government and people of Egypt bigger successes in their efforts for achieving the socio-political stability of the country and building developing and prosperous Egypt.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Egyptian FM
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Egyptian FM
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Friday sent a message of sympathy to his Egyptian counterpart Sameh Shoukry in connection with the fact that shortly ago the prosecutor general of Egypt was mercilessly killed by terrorists and terrorism in Sinai area claimed casualties. 
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and condolence to the bereaved families of the victims, bitterly denounced all forms of terrorism disturbing the socio-political stability and national unity of Egypt and extended full support and solidarity to the foreign minister and the people of Egypt in their efforts to achieve the security and stability of the country and achieve durable peace in the Mideast region.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message from Muhammadu Buhari, president of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, on June 29.
					 The message said:
					
					 On the occasion of the 21st anniversary of demise of the great HE Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, I would like to pay highest tribute to him and express firm solidarity with you and the friendly people of the DPRK on behalf of the federal government and people of Nigeria and on my own behalf.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, founding father of socialist Korea, was an outstanding leader who performed immortal great feats for the Korean revolution and the global cause of independence.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I hope that the friendly and cooperative relations between our two countries with a long history and tradition would grow stronger in all fields.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Korean youth and students in Japan and a home-visiting group of students of a Korean high school in Japan visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Saturday. The delegation is led by Pae Jun Ryol, vice- chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, and the group by Kim Yun Son, principal of Korean High School in Osaka.
					 They laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Remember Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Remember Kim Il Sung 
 Wonsan, July 4 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen met at Wonsan Port Saturday in commemoration of the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The participants laid bouquets before the statues of the President and leader Kim Jong Il in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province, and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were the captain and crewmen of Panama-flagged ship Sea Star 7. 
					
					 Speakers said the whole life of the President was the brilliant one of the peerlessly great man, who performed great feats for the country and its people, the times and history.
					
					 The President defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists with his brilliant military idea, strategy and tactics in the anti-Japanese revolutionary war and the Fatherland Liberation War and won historic victories, they said, and went on:
					
					 He shattered the imperialists' ambition for world domination and hegemonic moves and made contribution to protecting global peace and security by steering the trend of history in the 20th century to the road of independence.
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Trying to Evade Responsibility for Suspended Tour of Mt. Kumgang
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Trying to Evade Responsibility for Suspended Tour of Mt. Kumgang
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Guidance Bureau of Special Zone for International Tour of Mt. Kumgang gave an answer to the question put by KCNA Saturday as regards the south Korean regime's desperate bid to evade its responsibility for the suspended tour of Mt. Kumgang.
					 He said: 
					
					 Recently, south Koreans are becoming increasingly vocal calling for the resumption of tour of Mt. Kumgang which has long been in a hiatus due to the desperate obstructions on the part of the conservative group.
					
					 Those concerned of the Kumgangsan Businessmen Council of south Korea have urged the regime to pay compensation for the losses caused by the seven year-long suspension of the tour that seriously decayed and damaged their facilities at Mt. Kumgang resort built with their investment. 
					
					 They are bitterly complaining that the regime has neither taken any measure nor paid compensation for their losses amounting to astronomical figures.
					
					 This is an expression of curse and indignation at the puppet regime that has blocked the resumption of tour in a bid to attain its sinister politically-motivated purpose only, utterly indifferent to the aspiration and wishes of the south Korean people and their right to existence. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities are misleading public opinion, asserting that such problem occurred because the north refused to respond to their call for dialogue aimed to resume the tour. 
					
					 The tour of Mt. Kumgang called as an offspring of the June 15 joint declaration was suspended because the south Korean conservative group has deliberately blocked its resumption by abusing the incident of a south Korean tourist for the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and describing it as a financial source for the north.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the puppet group made nonsensical talks about "the north's abrogation of the agreement" and "violation of international law" over the international tour of Mt. Kumgang conducted by the DPRK. Not content with this desperate effort, the group is visiting other countries to implore them not to send tourists and investors to Mt. Kumgang and even threaten and blackmail businessmen overseas.
					
					 No matter what rhetoric the puppet group may use to cover up stark reality, no one would pay heed to it.

articles.title: Voter Rolls Displayed at Constituencies, Sub-Constituencies for Election of Deputies to People's Assemblies
articles.content:
Voter Rolls Displayed at Constituencies, Sub-Constituencies for Election of Deputies to People's Assemblies
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Constituencies and sub-constituencies for the election of deputies to the provincial (municipal), city (district) and county people's assemblies have displayed voter rolls on Saturday.
					 The voter rolls were worked out, thoroughly pursuant to the Law on the Elections of Deputies to the People's Assemblies at All Levels.
					
					 Registered there are all citizens with suffrage residing in the relevant areas.
					
					 The voters are confirming whether they are correctly registered.

articles.title: Paduk Encouraged in DPRK
articles.content:
Paduk Encouraged in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang City Paduk (go) Center was opened recently. The center has competent teachers, who proved successful at domestic and international paduk games in the past.
					 Paduk games will be also held at the two-storied center.
					
					 Kim Il Gwang, secretary of the Korean Paduk Association, told KCNA:
					
					 Paduk centers have been or will be built in every province and municipality of the country. Such centers already took their shapes in Pyongyang City, South Hamgyong, North and South Hwanghae and Jagang provinces.
					
					 The centers will be conducive to further developing paduk, one of national sports.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Ever-lasting Viability of Three Principles of National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Ever-lasting Viability of Three Principles of National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article that the publication of the July 4 joint statement which was recorded as a great event in the history of the national reunification movement was a valuable fruition of President Kim Il Sung's noble idea of independent reunification and patriotic will.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The President provided the north-south high-level political talks early in the 1970s, laying down the three principles of national reunification-- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--and making sure that they were solemnly clarified internally and externally through the north-south joint statement.
					
					 This offered an occasion of greeting a new turning phase in which the Koreans' national reunification movement was advancing on the principles of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity.
					
					 There took place a historic north-south summit in June, 2000 which resulted in adopting the June 15 joint declaration the core of which is By Our Nation Itself. Seven years since then saw the adoption of the October 4 declaration. They were shining successes made in the struggle of the Korean nation to embody the three principles of national reunification.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations which had witnessed the repetition of antagonism and confrontation made progress on the orbit of reconciliation and unity in the course of implementing the inter-Korean declarations and the desire to achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity grew strong on the Korean peninsula in those days. Such historical facts clearly proved the validity of the three principles of national reunification and their tremendous viability.
					
					 There can be no change in the fundamental principles for national reunification, no matter how much water may flow under the bridge and no matter how complicated the situation remains.
					
					 Only when all the fellow countrymen at home and overseas struggle, united close as one, holding high the banner of independent reunification as inspired by the great sun of the nation, they will see a new phase for improving the inter-Korean relations and surely achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces' Nonsensical Talks about "Provocations" Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces' Nonsensical Talks about "Provocations" Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet chief executive invited major commanding officers of the puppet army and bosses of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces present in south Korea to wining and dining recently at which she cried out for "maintaining high alertness," asserting "it is hard to predict any provocation from the north." 
					 Buoyed by her reckless utterances, Han Min Gu, puppet minister of Defense, was so ridiculous and reckless as to bluster he would "contain the north's provocations through prompt, accurate and stern punishment."
					
					 Commenting on this, leading newspapers of the DPRK Saturday say what they uttered is a deliberate artifice to stir up extreme hostility and war hysteria against compatriots in the north among their minions and further escalate the military tension between the north and the south.
					
					 "Provocations" much touted by them do not make any sense, Rodong Sinmun says, adding:
					
					 It is because of the chief executive-led puppet regime in south Korea that the north-south relations are inching close to the phase of ever more serious catastrophe, much less improving.
					
					 No matter how vociferous the puppet group becomes about "threat" and "provocation", it will get it nowhere.
					
					 The puppet group of traitors is keen on provocations against compatriots in the north, while doing harm to the lives and interests of the people in south Korea. Such acts are as foolish as dropping axes on their own feet.
					
					 Minju Joson says the above-said reckless remarks made by the puppet chief executive are no more than a poor trick to divert elsewhere the south Koreans' attention in an effort to calm down their mounting anti-"government" sentiments and tide over her worst ruling crisis.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Calls for Probing Truth behind Introduction of Anthrax Germs
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Calls for Probing Truth behind Introduction of Anthrax Germs
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of University Students held a press conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on July 2 in denunciation of the U.S. imperialist aggressors' introduction of anthrax germs. 
					 Speakers accused the U.S. forces of introducing bio-chemical weapons and testing them according to the "Jupiter plan" from 2013.
					
					 The U.S. forces have posed a serious threat to the lives of the south Korean people through the introduction of anthrax germs but they covered up the fact and are evading the responsibility for it, the speakers noted.
					
					 They called for thoroughly probing the truth behind the U.S. forces' introduction of anthrax germs and severely punishing those responsible for it.
					
					 The organization read out a protest letter demanding the U.S. chief executive make apology for abusing the human rights of the south Korean people through the introduction of anthrax germs, the U.S. forces probe the truth behind the anthrax germ experiment and revise the humiliating SOFA. The organization thrust the protest letter to the U.S. embassy.

articles.title: German Organization Lauds Kim Il Sung's Military Wisdom
articles.content:
German Organization Lauds Kim Il Sung's Military Wisdom 
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted an article titled "Comrade Kim Il Sung, outstanding strategist" on its website on June 25.
					 The article said:
					
					 It was ascribable to the brilliant military wisdom of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung that the army and people of the DPRK could win a shining victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, shattering the U.S. imperialists' myth about its "mightiness" and bringing about the beginning of its downhill turn.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK won a historic victory in the three year-long war against the U.S. imperialists which boasted of being "the strongest" and their allies under his wise leadership.
					
					 He convened an emergency meeting of the Cabinet right after the outbreak of the war and set forth a strategic line of beating back the invaders through high maneuverability, non-stop strikes and decisive counter-attack.
					
					 The Korean People's Army advanced into Seoul three days after the start of the war, hoisting the DPRK's flag atop the puppet Capital Building there, and liberated over 90 percent of the southern half of Korea in a little over a month.
					
					 U.S. imperialists' heavy cruiser called "a moving island" was sunken by torpedo attacks of navy men of the People's Army in the waters off Jumunjin.
					
					 The defence line around Kumgang which the U.S. imperialists called "a no retreat line" and "the last defence line" collapsed like a wet wall and the commander of the U.S. "undefeated division" who bragged that he would "gain trust by setting an example" was taken prisoner by a young soldier of the People's Army.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Sri Lanka
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Sri Lanka
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A Sri Lankan preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea, was formed in Colombo on June 28.
					 A vice-chairperson of the Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events including a seminar on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of those anniversaries (August 15 and October 10.)

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Bodies of Brazil, Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Bodies of Brazil, Germany
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Brazilian and German organizations posted special articles accompanied with photos of leader Kim Jong Il on their websites on June 18 and 19 on the 51st anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il is eternal leader of WPK".
					
					 The article said the Korean people are holding him in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the WPK which regards his idea and line as its guidelines.
					
					 The Korean people regarded him as the WPK and found in it their mother taking care of their destiny and future, the article noted.
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany in articles said the WPK greeted a new turning period in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche since he started his work at the Party Central Committee on June 19, 1964.  It was one of his greatest exploits that he developed the party into an invincible party, the articles added.

articles.title: Korean Photo and Book Exhibitions Held in Angola, Nigeria
articles.content:
Korean Photo and Book Exhibitions Held in Angola, Nigeria
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Korean photo and book exhibitions took place in Angola and Nigeria from June 24 to 30 in commemoration of the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at the venues of the exhibitions were photos dealing with the revolutionary career and exploits of the President.
					
					 Also display there were photos and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The acting chairman of the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples said that the President was the great man boundlessly revered not only by the Korean people but by the world progressives including the Angolan people.
					
					 He said that the President dedicated himself to the reunification and prosperity of Korea and people's happiness.
					
					 He added that the President rendered sincere support to the Angolan people in their struggle for national liberation and building of a new society and made a great contribution to the accomplishment of the global cause of independence.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Days to Be Celebrated in Serbia
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Days to Be Celebrated in Serbia
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and Korea's liberation was formed in Belgrade on June 26.
					 Lazar Aksentijevich, member of the leadership of the party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in founding and strengthening the WPK and achieving the prosperity of the DPRK and accomplishing the cause of Korea's reunification and organize various political and cultural events on these anniversaries.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Human Rights Campaign against DPRK Accused by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Human Rights Campaign against DPRK Accused by Swiss Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on June 24 lashing out at the south Korean puppet group for hosting the UN "office on human rights in the north" in Seoul, an anti-DPRK "human rights" machine.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The above-said office is aimed to cook up and spread misinformation about the DPRK and conduct a smear campaign against it.
					
					 The pro-U.S. puppet conservative authorities in south Korea are vociferating about non-existent "human rights issue" in the DPRK in a bid to mislead public attention while trampling down the freedom and rights of the people on the strength of the fascist "Security Law". This is the height of impudence and shame.
					
					 The establishment of the office is nothing but a base move to disturb the improvement of the north-south relations ardently desired by all Koreans.
					
					 We vehemently denounce the establishment of the office.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to all countermeasures taken by the DPRK.

articles.title: Immediate Removal of UN Office in S. Korea Demanded by Austrian Body
articles.content:
Immediate Removal of UN Office in S. Korea Demanded by Austrian Body
						
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria in a statement on June 27 blasted the south Korean puppet conservative regime for hosting a UN "office on human rights in the north" in Seoul.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We were bitterly angered by the news that a UN "office on human rights in the north" was set up in south Korea under the pretext of non-existent "human rights issue" in the DPRK.
					
					 As a matter of fact, it is not the DPRK but south Korea where human rights are wantonly abused.
					
					 The south Korean regime should immediately close the office, guarantee south Koreans genuine human rights and stop at once all its provocations against the compatriots in the north.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Cabo Verde
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Cabo Verde
						
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia primero un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Cabo Verde, Jorge Carlos Fonseca, con motivo del 40o aniversario de la independencia y la proclamacion de la Republica de ese pais africano.
					El remitente recuerda que durante los 40 anos despues de la independencia, se lograron en Cabo Verde grandes exitos en las labores para lograr la estabilidad y el desarrollo economico del pais.
					
					Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran conforme a los intereses mutuos, formulo votos por mayores exitos en los esfuerzos del presidente y el pueblo de Cabo Verde por el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita fiesta nacional del pueblo rwandes
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita fiesta nacional del pueblo rwandes
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 4 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Rwanda, Paul Kagame, con motivo de la fiesta nacional del pueblo rwandes.
					El remitente senala que esta complacido de que se logran grandes exitos en los esfuerzos del gobierno y el pueblo de  Rwanda para la reconciliacion, la unidad nacional y el desarrollo economico.
					
					Expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se amplien y se desarrollen mas en el futuro.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente egipcio
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente egipcio
						
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 3 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente de Egipto, Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, en relacion con que recientemente el fiscal general de Egipto murio por los terroristas y hubo perdidas humanas por el terrorismo armado ocurrido en la zona de Sinai de este pais.
					El remitente expresa profunda simpatia y condolencias al destinatario y por su conducto, a los familiares de las victimas y senala que rechazar todo tipo del terrorismo y cualquier apoyo a ello es la invariable posicion de la RPDC y esta condena fuertemente los presentes actos terroristas  ocurridos en Egipto.
					
					Subraya que en adelante tambien como en el pasado, estara al lado del destinatario y el gobierno amistoso de Egipto que luchan contra el terrorismo y por defender la seguridad y la estabilidad del pais y se esforzara activamente por consolidar y desarrollar sin cesar las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises.
					
					Y formula votos de todo corazon por mayores exitos en los esfuerzos del mandatario, el gobierno y el pueblo de Egipto para lograr la estabilidad socio-politica del pais y construir Egipto prospero.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong expresa condolencias a su homologo egipcio
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong expresa condolencias a su homologo egipcio
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- El canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea,  Ri Su Yong, envio el dia 3 un mensaje de condolencias a su homologo egipcio, Sameh Shoukry, en relacion con que recientemente el fiscal general de Egipto fue asesinado cruelmente por los terroristas y hubo perdidas humanas por el terrorismo ocurrido en la region de Sinai.
					El remitente expresa profunda simpatia y condolencias a los familiares de las victimas y condena categoricamente todo tipo del terrorismo que destruye la estabilidad socio-politica y la unidad nacional de Egipto.
					
					Expresa irrestricto apoyo y solidaridad con los esfuerzos del canciller y su pueblo por lograr la seguridad y la estabilidad del pais y la paz duradera en la region del Oriente Medio.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju averigua sector agricola de provincia de Hwanghae de Norte
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju averigua sector agricola de provincia de Hwanghae de Norte
						
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno el sector agricola de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					Pak recorrio la granja cooperativa de Pyong-am del distrito Koksan, las represas de Phyong-am y Singok y el lugar de construccion de la represa No. 2 de Wangdang del distrito Singye para averiguar en detalles el estado de abonamiento y cuidado de los cultivos, la cantidad de reserva de agua, la eficiencia economica de la estructura de las represas, etc. y  convoco la reunion consultiva.
					
					En la ocasion subrayo que suministrar plenamente el agua a la llanura Miru es la labor importante para glorificar para siempre las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Y se tomaron medidas para elevar mas el papel de los trabajadores agricolas en aumentar la produccion agricola, administrar los canales con responsabilidad y depositar por todos los medios el agua al acelerar la construccion de represas.
					
					Con anterioridad, el premier Pak recorrio el Instituto de Ciencia Fruticola de la Academia de Ciencias Agricolas y la Almaciga Central del Ministerio de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental, ocasiones en las cuales exhorto a cubrir de frondosos bosques todos los montes patrios y producir y suministrar muchas posturas de arbol de buena especie, en acato a los legados del Presidente y el Dirigente y al noble proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente nigeriano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente nigeriano
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje que le dedicara el 29 de junio el presidente de la Republica Federal de Nigeria, Muhammadu Buhari.
					El texto senala:
					
					Con motivo del 21o aniversario del deceso de Su Excelencia el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, le rindo el homenaje mas sublime en nombre del gobierno federal y el pueblo de Nigeria y en el mio propio y expreso la firme solidaridad con el amistoso pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					Su Excelencia el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, fundador de la Corea socialista, es el destacado dirigente quien acumulo grandes proezas imborrables en la revolucion coreana y la causa de la independencia del mundo.
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad deseo que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos paises de larga historia y tradicion se amplien y se desarrollen mas en todas las esferas.
